title: 斗篷（披肩）MOD
author: MetricVoidLX
txt_content:
本帖最后由 leezixi 于 2013-6-4 13:05 编辑 

英文不好

Everybody wants a cape and now you can get one! Create an account in ten seconds and login, upload a cape image or choose one from the gallery! All you have to do now is copy one small changed file into your minecraft.jar file and then you can see it on your character!

Features:
- Your own custom cape!
- Anyone else who has this mod will see your cape and you will see theirs!
- Turn your cape on and off with a simple tick box on this website!
- Change your cape at any time!

Please see the website for more information on transparent and animated capes!


翻译：
每个人都想要斗篷，现在你可以得到一个 ！十秒创建一个帐户、 上载斗篷图像,或者从库中选择一个 ！所有你要做的就是现在是复制一个小小的更改过的文件的文件到您的 minecraft.jar 文件，然后你可以看到它在你的角色上 ！

特点：
-自定义斗篷 ！
-还有谁有这个 mod 将会看到你的斗篷，你也会看到他们的 ！
-把你的斗篷打开和关闭，只需要一个复选！
-在任何时间更改您的斗篷 ！

请参阅详细信息网站上透明和动画的披风 ！
